meanings.sent1: The unwitting child wandered off in the store.
meanings.sent2: She made an unwitting mistake by pressing the wrong button.
meanings.sent3: The unwitting puppy chased its own tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: His unwitting involvement in the prank led to unexpected consequences.
meanings.sent5: The unwitting explorer stumbled upon a hidden treasure in the forest.

meanings.sent1: The unwitting thief took the wrong bag by mistake.
meanings.sent2: He made an unwitting comment that offended his friend.
meanings.sent3: The unwitting chef added salt instead of sugar to the cake.
meanings.sent4: Her unwitting betrayal of trust left a lasting impact on their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The unwitting driver turned down the wrong road and got lost.
